meta.description: A company wants to hire new employees while minimizing the total salary cost, subject to budget, qualification, experience, and selection constraints.

sets.name: CANDIDATES
sets.description: List of candidates available for hiring.

params.name: experience
params.description: Work experience of each candidate in years.

vars.name: hire
vars.description: Binary decision variable indicating whether to hire a candidate.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(hire[c] * salary[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
objective.description: Minimize the total salary cost of hired candidates.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(hire[c] * salary[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
constraints.description: Total salary of hired candidates must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: min_1_advanced_degree
constraints.description: Hire at least one candidate with a Master's or PhD degree.

constraints.name: min_12_years_experience
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(hire[c] * experience[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
constraints.description: Total work experience of hired candidates must be at least 12 years.

constraints.name: at_most_one_A_or_E
constraints.description: Due to similar skills, hire at most one of candidate A or E.
